Definition: You will be given a hateful post in English from online platforms. The post will contain a target being harassed. Your task is to classify the target as either an individual or generic. An individual is a single person, while generic is a group of people. Note that the URLs in the text have been replaced with [Link].

Positive Examples.input: Post: Stop tweeting about your boyfriend. No one gives a shit. And you're gonna break up in a month anyway #WomenSuck
Positive Examples.explanation: The target being harassed in the post is the person he or she is replying to. Thus, the post should be classified as individual.
Th post is hateful towards a group of people instead of individuals.

Negative Examples.input: Post: What do you call a woman who has lost 95% of her intelligence? Divorced
Negative Examples.explanation: This post should be classified as generic because it is hateful towards all divorced women instead of a particular one.

Negative Examples.input: Post: @Asholeee_  come on woman do your job right #WomenSuck
Negative Examples.explanation: This post should be classified as individual because it is hateful towards the user @Asholeee_.
